template <typename BlockT>
struct vsip::impl::Expr_ops_per_point
File: ../../../vsip/opt/expr/ops_info.hpp

This generates the total number of operations per point in a given expression. It also computes the total number of points, as this information is needed to calculate the total number of operations.
